strings.SS2_MULE_PASSIVE_DRONE_DESCRIPTION: Taking damage to below <style=cIsHealth>25% health</style> releases a <style=cIsUtility>personal repair drone</style>, <style=cIsHealing>healing</style> you for <style=cIsHealing>35%</style> of <style=cIsHealing>maximum health</style> and temporarily increasing <style=cIsUtility>armor</style>.
